reviews.review_msg: Great prof, One of the best

A bit disorganized, but passionate and very kind. He relied on the fact that students were supposed to read textbooks, but as long as I followed the readings, his explanations and assignments were very clear. Final exam ressembles much of what had been during the term.
really boring class, really boring lectures. he doesnt explain concepts and terms in a thorough way. Instead of defining concepts, he just gives very incomprehensive examples. really bothers me
no study guide, no review, tons of work needed to do. I was in his cmpt 120 class, he was nice before. Now he is really bad. Jerry, seriously..I would like you to be a little more helpful.
I used to like computer science. Did terrible on midterm.  Even doing all the homework questions or understanding all the textbook examples did not help at all.
the method he is teaching is not helping at all! 3 hour class, he used 2 hour as open discussion, while only a few people know what to do. I wish I drop this course, ruined my entire summer
HORRIBLE PROFF. IN SIMON FRASER UNIVERSITY.HOMEWORK AND MIDTERM ON SAME DAY AND MIDTERMS ARE COMPUTER BASED(WRITE CODE IN CLASS). NOT TAKE CLASS WITH THIS PROFF.
had Ta covered half of the first term, The stuff he taught is simple, but ridiculous hard exam and hw. I really dont know anything! he can not teach
